name: DirectorySearcher Powershell Exploitation
description: Enumerates Active Directory to determine computers that are joined to the domain
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-Object\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.PropertiesToLoad.Add* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.findall\(\)* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Properties.name*)`
